items.title: US intensifying bid to end Ukraine war - but chances of success remain unclear
items.description: Negotiations are gathering pace but the proposals being put forward by Trump's team still have major gaps

items.title: Suspension of Ghana's chief justice is 'abuse of power', says opposition
items.description: This is the first time in Ghana's history that a president has removed a chief justice from office.

items.title: Abbas calls Hamas 'sons of dogs' and demands release of Gaza hostages
items.description: Palestinian Authority president says that Hamas has given Israel "excuses" to continue the Gaza war.

items.title: Vance says US will 'walk away' unless Ukraine and Russia agree to proposals
items.description: Vance issued the warning after top US officials pulled out of London talks aimed at securing a ceasefire.

items.title: Nine killed in Russian attack on Ukraine bus
items.description: At least 30 were injured in the city of Marhanets in central-south Ukraine.
